name: Neon Channel Product Customizer Free
author: Vertim Coders

sections.description:
About the Neon Channel Product Customizer Free

  • Plugin site: signsdesigner.us

Overview

The ultimate app for selling custom signs with WooCommerce.
Supports a wide range of products such as neon signs, LED signs, acrylic signs, metal signs, 2D and 3D channel letter signs.

NCPC allows you to extend your business of personalization of neon signs by offering you a configurator to allow your customers to customize online prior to order their custom neon sign. Easy and quick to set up.

Features

  • Custom TTF fonts support
  • Custom colors palette for limited colors usage
  • Definition of customization sizes and number of characters per text
  • Translation ready
  • Shortcode available
  • Design data in cart
  • Pricing calculation
  • Automatic calculation of text height
  • Responsive and user-friendly

Pro features

  • RGB Visualisation
  • Background Previews
  • Every option can control the price
  • Parcel size pricing
  • Backing Colors And Images
  • Custom Manufacturer Emails
  • Export SVG files for your manufacturer
  • Advanced material measurement

Live Demo

DEMO CUSTOM NEON CHANNEL PRODUCT CUSTOMIZER.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or greater
  • Woocommerce version 7.4 or greater
  • PHP version 7.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working

Automatic installation (easiest way)

To do an automatic install of Neon Channel Product Customizer Free, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field type “Neon Channel Product Customizer Free” and click Search Plugins. Once you have found it you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

Uploading in WordPress Dashboard

  1. Download `neon-channel-product-customizer-free.zip`
  2. Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  3. Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  4. Select `neon-channel-product-customizer-free.zip` from your computer
  5. Click ‘Install Now’
  6. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

Using FTP

  1. Download `neon-channel-product-customizer-free.zip`
  2. Extract the `neon-channel-product-customizer-free` directory to your computer
  3. Upload the `neon-channel-product-customizer-free` directory to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory
  4. Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard

The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to install a WordPress plugin.

Updating

You can use automatic update to update the plugin safely.
sections.faq:
Where can I find Neon Channel Product Customizer Free documentation and user guides

You can also access our online documentation here

If you get stuck you can open a ticket here.

Will Neon Channel Product Customizer Free work with my theme?

Neon Channel Product Customizer Free works with any theme, including the default WordPress themes.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0 2024-08-02

-Add Mono and Zou skins
-Fixed add-to-cart problem

= 1.0 2023-12-03
-First stable release submitted

short_description: NCPC is a WordPress/WooCommerce plugin that helps you set up your online custom neon sign store, and receives orders from your customers.
